name: Indie Night
description:
Hey, you! 

What're you doing?

Go back to sleep!

Oh, you're a dev... 

Well, you may want to play this game! 

At least it'll be relatable for you...

You just have to make the character go to sleep.

Yep, it's that easy!

CONTROLS:

You'll find two bars:

  • Time bar (top): it shows how much time is left until you have to go to work in the morning.
  • Sleeping bar (left): it shows how ready to go to sleep you are.

The game will finish when one of these bars is completed.

Use ESC to pause the game.

 Quick tutorial:

CLICK x 1CLICK x 10CLICK AND HOLD

There are 3 different endings... Which one did you get? 

Share it with us in the comments!

WE'RE NIGHT OWLS!! AND HERE ARE OUR SOCIAL MEDIA:
